parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Middle, in the middle, between, in the midst of. From meta; middle (neuter) noun).

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To ask, inquire, ascertain by inquiry, understand.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Dative Feminine Singular
str2: Of what sort. From the base of pou and hoios; individualizing interrogative what sort of, or which one.
From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: Of what sort. From the base of pou and hoios; individualizing interrogative what sort of, or which one.
Name, character, fame, reputation. From a presumed derivative of the base of ginosko; a 'name'.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
